Articles.Content:
Yo. Kinda new at KSP, not a complete noob, but I still suck. I might nott post very often, but i am reading and active.

Things I can do

Munar/Minmus Missions

Design semi-legit rockets

Land on Duna

Things I can't do

Land reliably

Dock without MechJeb assist

Come back from Duna

So, be seeing everyone.

Hello!

Learning the gimbal symbols and using the H N I J K L with RCS on makes docking a bit easier. Just remember to go slow and take your time. Try to line up your target symbol onto your trajectory marker. You can get pretty close doing that then the rest is fine tuning.

Hope that helps!

Yo. Kinda new at KSP, not a complete noob, but I still suck. I might nott post very often, but i am reading and active.

Things I can do

Munar/Minmus Missions

Design semi-legit rockets

Land on Duna

Things I can't do

Land reliably

Dock without MechJeb assist

Come back from Duna

So, be seeing everyone.

Well you can do many more things than I can do now!! You should be very proud of yourself sir!!! Anyhow welcome to the forums!!
